content: {"name": "Salvation Army of Cabarrus County", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients can get food every 90 days and clothes every 6 months", "email": "", "url": "www.salvationarmycarolinas.org/cabarrus", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "216 Patterson Avenue Southeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Concord", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28025", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.4146601, "longitude": -80.5743535}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 782-7822", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
